short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lower the brightness of you tabs even more with Extra Dim.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Extra Dim" allows you to further reduce your screen brightness, providing an additional layer of comfort for your eyes, especially in low-light environments. Perfect for late-night usage or those sensitive to bright screens.
